content: आहृ {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To bring, fetch; यदेव वव्रे तदपश्यदाहृतं <ls>R. 3. 6</ls>; पुष्पं फलं चार्तवमाहरंत्यः <ls n="R.">14. 77</ls>, <ls n="R.">18. 8</ls>; प्रतिवाक्यं to bring an answer; वार्तां bring news. {@--2@} To bring near, give; चंद्रगुप्ताय मेदिनीं <ls>Kām. 1. 5</ls>; अयाचिताहृत <ls>Y. 1. 215.</ls> {@--3@} To recover, bring back. {@--4@} To obtain, get, receive; <ls>Ms. 2. 183</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">6. 27</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">7. 80</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">8. 151</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">11. 12</ls>; <ls>Y. 1. 97.</ls> {@--5@} To have, assume; आजह्नतुस्तच्चरणौ… श्रियं <ls>Ku. 3. 33.</ls> {@--6@} To cause, produce, lead to; बलोपचयं <ls>K. 105</ls>; प्रीतिं, क्रोधं &c; जनकानां कुले कीर्तिमाहरिष्यति मे सुता <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--7@} To bring near (as wife), marry; <ls>Ku. 6. 28.</ls> {@--8@} To wear, put on (as armour &c.); <ls>Ki. 1. 35.</ls> {@--9@} To offer in a sacrifice, to perform (as a sacrifice); स विश्वजितमाजह्ने <ls>R. 4. 86</ls>, <ls n="R.">14. 87.</ls> {@--10@} To take away, attract (as mind). {@--11@} To separate, remove, draw off from. {@--12@} To scare or frighten away, drive forth. {@--13@} To use as food or drink, eat. {@--14@} To speak, say, name, call. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To make one fetch or bring, cause to give or pay; <ls>Ms. 10. 119.</ls> {@--2@} To eat. {@--3@} To bring together, collect; <ls>Pt. 3. 151.</ls> {@--4@} To cause, produce. {@--5@} To exact. {@--6@} To show, exhibit.
